title: Enable API-keyless web search for images and videos in media generator

requirements.text: Remove API key requirement from image search functionality in MediaDisplay component, allowing users to search for images without authentication

quotes: make it so you dont need an api key just make it so you can just use it

acceptanceCriteria: Users can search for images without entering or configuring an API key
Image search returns results from web sources
Search functionality works immediately without setup steps

requirements.text: Extend web search functionality to video generation tab in MediaDisplay, enabling users to search for videos from the web based on text queries

quotes: if you ask it for an image or an videoa it goes to the web and searchhes for it

acceptanceCriteria: Video generation tab includes web search capability
Users can enter text queries to search for videos
Search results display video previews or thumbnails
Videos from search results are viewable in the interface

requirements.text: Integrate web search as the primary mechanism for all media generation requests in MediaDisplay, triggering automatic web searches when users request images or videos

quotes: runs th e whole media genorater hting

acceptanceCriteria: Both image and video tabs use web search as the default generation method
User input triggers web search automatically
Results are displayed in a unified, consistent interface
No API key configuration is required for any media generation feature

constraints: Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Maintain existing MediaDisplay component structure and tab navigation
nonGoals: Adding AI-generated image or video synthesis
Implementing custom media hosting or storage
Adding authentication or user accounts for media search
Creating a backend API for media search proxying
